Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: The primary goal to deliver as much value as possible

Name: minimize_effort_per_feature
Description: Aims to develop features with the least amount of effort

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Focuses on improving team morale and process satisfaction over time.

Name: minimize_number_of_open_blockers
Description: Aims to reduce the number of impediments hindering the team's progress at any given time.

Name: maximize_priority_of_user_stories
Description: Prioritizes the completion of user stories with the highest business value.

Name: minimize_project_budget_usage
Description: Aims to deliver the project goals while staying under the allocated budget.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Focuses on ensuring the main objective of each sprint is successfully met.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Encourages focusing on features relevant to high-influence stakeholders.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Seeks to complete individual tasks as efficiently as possible

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Aims to increase the team's average output over several sprints

Name: maximize_feature_priority_in_release
Description: Ensures that the features planned for a release have the highest possible cumulative priority.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Focuses on resolving blockers with the highest severity first to mitigate their impact.
